urls.title: Jamaica CARES
urls.description: Travelling to Jamaica and enjoying a vacation has been made easier. Here is what you need to know. Do I need to get a COVID-19 test to travel to Jamaica? No, Jamaica has removed the pre travel COVID-19 test requirement for all inbound travellers. For arrival processing, all travellers are required to submit an Immigration/Customs C5 card and may do so online at https://enterjamaica.com OR complete the paper form issued in flight by the airline. No, travellers do not need to be vaccinated. Where can I
